page.title: 11OUR SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: {We have got lots of instruments.}We have some chime bars & a xylophone & every Monday we have recorders. We paint fairy-tales but sometimes we paint animals' heads.Every Wednesday afternoon we have a crafty afternoon & we like that best of all. {Our school is doing a play}"The Tailor of Gloucester",we all dress up in cos- tumes.The characters are the Tailor, Simpkin,the Mayor & the Mice.We sing lots of songs & some of us act. { {We do spellings on Wednesdays,}hand- writing & science writing. {We go out to play after Assembly.}Some times we have fruit.The boys are always running about & pulling the girls' hair. One boy is a bit naughty. On dry days we have bats,balls & ropes.{By 7 year olds from Tacolneston {First School.
